column1: Symptoms of a broken toe include: - Pain - Swelling - Bruising that can last up to 2 weeks - Stiffness If your toe is crooked after the injury, the bone may be out of place and need to be straightened in order to heal properly.
For pain, you can use ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) or naproxen (Aleve, Naprosyn).
You may also take acetaminophen (such as Tylenol) for pain relief.
